country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) patent_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data/patent.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: type, #> number, country, abstract, title, kind, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} uspc_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data/uspc.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data/patent_assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data/assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: number, #> country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ::: #---------------------Qustion 1------------------------ ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_ccc5496a4c850ca20d905fd5ab42d9b7'} ```{.r .cell-code} class(assignee_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "spec_tbl_df" "tbl_df" "tbl" "data.frame" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setDT(assignee_tbl) class(patent_assignee_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "spec_tbl_df" "tbl_df" "tbl" "data.frame" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setDT(patent_assignee_tbl) class(patent_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "spec_tbl_df" "tbl_df" "tbl" "data.frame" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setDT(patent_tbl) tic() Q1_patent_data <- merge(x = patent_assignee_tbl, y = assignee_tbl, by.x="assignee_id", by.y ="id", all.x = TRUE, all.y = FALSE) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.26 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setkey(Q1_patent_data, "assignee_id") key(Q1_patent_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "assignee_id" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} Q1_patent_data %>% dim() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 315910 4 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} keep_cols <- c("assignee_id","patent_id","organization") Q1_patent_data <- Q1_patent_data[, ..keep_cols] Q1_patent_data %>% dim() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 315910 3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} Q1_patent_data %>% glimpse() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Rows: 315,910 #> Columns: 3 #> $ assignee_id "org_004j997jM9yEdS7z4ReD", "org_004j997jM9yEdS7z4ReD", "… #> $ patent_id "8728438", "8921361", "8857791", "8845559", "8815936", "8… #> $ organization "University of Basel", "University of Basel", "Zetkama Sp… ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Count_Q1 contains the data of the companies/organisations and the number of patents they hold in decending oreder tic() Count_Q1<- Q1_patent_data %>% filter(!is.na(organization)) %>% count(organization)%>% arrange(desc(n)) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.49 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Print the top 10 companies with max patents head(Count_Q1,10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #---------------------Qustion 2------------------------ ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_2b5b7f4da731f1eb86716bdd4bba4e62'} ```{.r .cell-code} class(patent_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "data.table" "data.frame" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setDT(patent_tbl) #Q2_patent_all has patent,patentdata,asignee data merged tic() Q2_patent_all <- merge(x = patent_tbl, y = Q1_patent_data, by.x="id", by.y ="patent_id", all.x = TRUE, all.y = FALSE) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 1.21 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Selecting a timeframe (Aug 1 2014 to Aug 31 2014) and building a new data frame Q2_Aug_patents Q2_Aug_patents<- with(Q2_patent_all, Q2_patent_all[(date >= "2014-08-01" & date <= "2014-08-31") ]) #Count_Aug has the data of all the organisations that got a patent in Aug 2014 in desc order #with number of patents tic() Count_Aug<- Q2_Aug_patents %>% filter(!is.na(organization)) %>% count(organization)%>% arrange(desc(n)) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.07 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Company with most patents in August 2014 head(Count_Aug,1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Top 10 companies with new patents in August 2014 head(Count_Aug,10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #---------------------Qustion 3------------------------ ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_50f56581f0b9d90826c9c968d0b63a92'} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() Q3_patent_all <- merge(x = uspc_tbl, y = Q1_patent_data, by.x="patent_id", by.y ="patent_id", all.x = TRUE, all.y = FALSE) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 5.97 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Most innovative class can be calculated by summing the total number of patents for each class tic() mostinnovative_class_Q3<- Q3_patent_all %>% filter(!is.na(mainclass_id)) %>% count(mainclass_id)%>% arrange(desc(n)) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.17 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #making a df of top10 companies only to investigate the top 5 uspto Q3_top10 <- Q3_patent_all[Q3_patent_all$organization %in% c('International Business Machines Corporation','Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.','Canon Kabushiki Kaisha','Sony Corporation','Microsoft Corporation','Google Inc.','Kabushiki Kaisha Toshiba','QUALCOMM Incorporated','LG Electronics Inc.','Panasonic Corporation'),] #adding a new column with has Company name & Class togeather titled "Company_Class" Q3_top10$Company_Class <- paste(Q3_top10$organization, Q3_top10$mainclass_id) #Counting the Company_class and arranging in desc order tic() Q3_top10_CC<- Q3_top10 %>% count(Company_Class)%>% arrange(desc(n)) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> 0.03 sec elapsed ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #displaying the most innovative class and its corresponding number of patents of that class head(mostinnovative_class_Q3,1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Shows the top 5 USPTO Classes from the top 10 companies granted patents head(Q3_top10_CC,5) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
